It compiles fine for me.
Get SRL 4.0 and SCAR Divi 3.12.
EDIT:For typesend, you add {.include SRL/SRL.scar} under program.

item.title: Help With Script Please
item.dc:creator: @jvwarrior jvwarrior
item.description:
@jvwarrior wrote:

Ok Im Just Practicing Scripting So This Isnt A Runescape Script But What It Is Suppose To Do Is Click File Then Save As To Double Click The Text Box And Type Second Script Revised And Save While SCAR is In Full Mode. Its Still Not Completely Finished But This Is The Error I Keep Getting:

Failed when compiling [Error] (21:4): Semicolon (';') expected

so I looked over it and noticed i onlty had the procedure so i added the rest but it wouldnt type so i desided to use typesend(Talk)

and this is the script:

[code]program SecondScript;

const
Talk=‘Second Script Revised’;

procedure Save;
begin
MoveMouseSmooth(11,38);
ClickMouse(11,38,True);
Wait(1000);
MoveMouseSmooth(9,167);
ClickMouse(9,167,True);
MoveMouseSmooth(803,496);
ClickMouse(803,496,True);
MoveMouseSmooth(1070,497);
ClickMouse(1070,497,True);
MoveMouseSmooth(604,449);
ClickMouse(700,497,True);
ClickMouse(700,497,True);
SendKeysSilent(Talk + chr(13));
end;

begin
Save;
end.[/code]

When I Tryed typesend(Talk) i got this error:

Failed when compiling Line 20: [Error] (20:1): Unknown identifier 'typesend' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.12\Scripts\Second Script Revised.scar

Now I Dont Know Wats Wrong.

Read full topic
